name: wxFormBuilder Project
summary: Learn about .FBP files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: The FBP file is the central wxFormBuilder development file that contains project settings and references to other files used by the project.

description: Project file for wxFormBuilder, a rapid application development (RAD) tool for wxWidgets; includes a graphical user interface (GUI) for creating forms based on the wxWidgets framework.
